alert.note: Alert for Rabun (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 7:51PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rabun, Macon and central Jackson Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 751 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sylva to 3 miles west of Franklin to 5 miles northeast of Hayesville. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Franklin, Sylva, Clayton, Cullowhee, Highlands, Mountain City, Webster, Dillard, Sky Valley and Dillsboro. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
